channel.title: Tip: iOS Sharesheet Shortcuts for Drafts (part 2): Inline Images & excerpting from a PDF
channel.description:
All shortcuts offer the choice between creating a new draft or appending to the last modified draft. The latter is most useful for the shortcut that quotes from a PDF, which I mostly use for creating excerpts I read on my iPad.
Any ideas for improvement are welcome! (split into two posts, as I cannot post more than two links per post as new user, sorry)
—
for Images: Image as Inline Markdown URL (uploaded via imgur) https://www.icloud.com/shortcuts/128a3d90322746d89188127fd83a3925
for reading & excerpting PDFs: Quote from PDF with page no. reference https://www.icloud.com/shortcuts/10b52235f20d43c6b47b246ab749bc8c
